HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Zikufichidwa, chitetezo ndi chitetezo ndi Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Tikhazikitsa chitetezo chogwira pa zidziwitso zanu zokhudza. Zonse zimakhala zikufichidwa pa mbali ya makasitomala. Sitidziwa IP yanu, zomwe mukugawana, kapena amene mukugawana nawo maulalo achinsinsi - ndipo chofunika kwambiri, zomwe zikuphatikizidwa.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Ndinu okha omwe mumadziwa ulalo wa chinsinsi chomwe chinalenga ndi amene mukugawana nalo. Mukalenga chinsinsi, mutha kuwonjezera chinsinsi musanadabwe. Ndipo zimathandiza kukonza nthawi ya burner. Popanda chilichonse, chinsinsi chidzachotsedwa mutatha masiku 14.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Maulalo ndi zomwe zikuphatikizidwa zikufichidwa pa mbali ya makasitomala, kutanthauza kuti sitidziwa ulalo ndi zomwe zikuphatikizidwa. Ulalo uliwonse uli ndi ID yapadera ya 36 yokhala ndi chitsimikizo cha njira imodzi kuti mupeze Uthenga Wachinsinsi ndi zomwe zikuphatikizidwa zomwe zafichidwa ndi AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Lembani uthenga wanu ndi / kapena kupanga chinsinsi
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Zikufichidwa, chitetezo ndi chitetezo ndi Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Lembani Uthenga Wanu Wachinsinsi, chinsinsi kapena zomwe zili zofunika *

VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Lembani ndikugawana uthenga, zidzakhalapo chotsedwa mutakhala mukuwona.
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Tsegulani Stellar Secret pa foni, pangani uthenga wanu wachinsinsi
